001package edu.cnm.deepdive.gravity.view;
002
003import android.content.Context;
004import android.content.res.Resources;
005import android.graphics.Canvas;
006import android.graphics.Rect;
007import android.graphics.drawable.Drawable;
008import android.util.AttributeSet;
009import android.view.View;
010import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
011import androidx.annotation.Nullable;
012import androidx.core.content.res.ResourcesCompat;
013import edu.cnm.deepdive.gravity.R;
014import edu.cnm.deepdive.gravity.model.Enemy;
015import edu.cnm.deepdive.gravity.model.GameField;
016import edu.cnm.deepdive.gravity.model.Meteor;
017
018public class GameFieldView extends View {
019
020  private final Rect destination = new Rect();
021  int test = 0;
022  private GameField gameField;
023  private Drawable shipImage;
024  private Drawable meteorImage;
025  private Drawable projectileImage;
026  private Drawable enemyImage;
027
028
029  public GameFieldView(Context context) {
030    super(context);
031    loadResources(context.getResources());
032  }
033
034  public GameFieldView(Context context,
035      @Nullable AttributeSet attrs) {
036    super(context, attrs);
037    loadResources(context.getResources());
038  }
039
040  public GameFieldView(Context context, @Nullable AttributeSet attrs, int defStyleAttr) {
041    super(context, attrs, defStyleAttr);
042    loadResources(context.getResources());
043  }
044
045  public GameFieldView(Context context, @Nullable AttributeSet attrs, int defStyleAttr,
046      int defStyleRes) {
047    super(context, attrs, defStyleAttr, defStyleRes);
048    loadResources(context.getResources());
049  }
050
051
052  @Override
053  protected void onDraw(@NonNull Canvas canvas) {
054    super.onDraw(canvas);
055
056    if (gameField != null) {
057      int canvasWidth = canvas.getWidth();
058      int canvasHeight = canvas.getHeight();
059      int gameWidth = gameField.getBoundingBox().width();
060      int gameHeight = gameField.getBoundingBox().height();
061      double horizontalScale = (double) canvasWidth / gameWidth;
062      double verticalScale = (double) canvasHeight / gameHeight;
063
064      // TODO: 11/20/23 Draw the ship on canvas.
065      if (gameField.getShip() != null) {
066        Rect shipBox = gameField.getShip().getShipBox();
067        destination.set((int) (shipBox.left * horizontalScale),
068            (int) (shipBox.top * verticalScale),
069            (int) (shipBox.right * horizontalScale),
070            (int) (shipBox.bottom * verticalScale));
071        shipImage.setBounds(destination);
072        shipImage.draw(canvas);
073//        Paint outlinePaint = new Paint();
074//        outlinePaint.setStyle(Paint.Style.STROKE);
075//        outlinePaint.setStrokeWidth(5); 
076//        outlinePaint.setColor(Color.RED);
077//        canvas.drawRect(destination, outlinePaint);
078      }
079
080      if (gameField.getProjectile() != null) {
081        Rect projectileBox = gameField.getProjectile().getProjectileBox();
082        destination.set((int) (projectileBox.left * horizontalScale),
083            (int) (projectileBox.top * verticalScale),
084            (int) (projectileBox.right * horizontalScale),
085            (int) (projectileBox.bottom * verticalScale));
086        projectileImage.setBounds(destination);
087        projectileImage.draw(canvas);
088      }
089
090      for (Meteor meteor : gameField.getMeteors()) {
091        Rect meteorBox = meteor.getMeteorBox();
092        destination.set((int) (meteorBox.left * horizontalScale),
093            (int) (meteorBox.top * verticalScale),
094            (int) (meteorBox.right * horizontalScale),
095            (int) (meteorBox.bottom * verticalScale));
096        meteorImage.setBounds(destination);
097        meteorImage.draw(canvas);
098
099//        Paint outlinePaint = new Paint();
100//        outlinePaint.setStyle(Paint.Style.STROKE);
101//        outlinePaint.setStrokeWidth(5);
102//        outlinePaint.setColor(Color.RED);
103//        canvas.drawRect(destination, outlinePaint);
104      }
105
106      for (Enemy enemy : gameField.getEnemies()) {
107        Rect enemyBox = enemy.getEnemyBox();
108        destination.set((int) (enemyBox.left * horizontalScale),
109            (int) (enemyBox.top * verticalScale),
110            (int) (enemyBox.right * horizontalScale),
111            (int) (enemyBox.bottom * verticalScale));
112        enemyImage.setBounds(destination);
113        enemyImage.draw(canvas);
114      }
115    }
116
117    // TODO: 11/20/23 Draw the rest of the objects.
118
119  }
120
121
122  public GameField getGameField() {
123    return gameField;
124  }
125
126  public void setGameField(GameField gameField) {
127    this.gameField = gameField;
128  }
129
130
131  private void loadResources(Resources resources) {
132    shipImage = ResourcesCompat.getDrawable(resources, R.drawable.ship, null);
133    meteorImage = ResourcesCompat.getDrawable(resources, R.drawable.meteor2, null);
134    enemyImage = ResourcesCompat.getDrawable(resources, R.drawable.enemy, null);
135    projectileImage = ResourcesCompat.getDrawable(resources, R.drawable.projectile9, null);
136  }
137
138
139}
